name: Drop of Distortion
description: Now untethered Giratina is able to release some of the Distortion World's warping power onto the Battlefield.
effect: If an attack by the User would deal Ineffective damage damage to the target, the User may choose to instead resolve damage as if the attack was Super Effective. This effect may only be used once per target per scene. The User is unaffected by Ground Type attacks (but is still subject to Hazard and Terrain effects). While undergoing a Stat Reset the character may choose to change forms.
